page.description: Gets the value of a specific key from the session-state collection.
page.syntax: Context.Session.GetData as L (Key as C, ByRef Value as A)

argument.name: Key as C
argument.description: The key of the session-state variable to be retrieved.

argument.name: ByRef Value as A
argument.description: A reference to a variable to receive the session-state variable value.

page.discussion: Context.Session.GetData() gets the value of a specific key from the session-state collection. Check *[link:Context.Session.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
